data.price: Ne klonite duhom, i ne žalostite se! Vi ćete pobijediti, ako vjernici budete.
data.arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

meta.transliteration: walā tahinū walā taḥzanū wa-antumu al-aʿlawna in kuntum mu'minīna

dua.name: Dua for Resilience
dua.significanceReason: Encourages believers to maintain hope, strength, and emotional resilience during challenging times. Promotes psychological and spiritual endurance.

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.
